long_description: Fast cars and long nights fueled the birth of NASCAR racing and Dale Earnhardt, Jr.'s McCoy Polarized Sunglasses from Spy. They have Dale Jr.'s signature imprinted inside. Polycarbonate lenses are impact- and shatter-resistant, perfect for outdoor sports; lenses block 100% of harmful UV rays. Polarization cuts glare from water, sand, snow and asphalt. Spy Happy Lens(TM) technology enhances color and contrast. Green Spectra mirroring on the bronze lenses helps reflect glare. Lightweight and comfortable, Propionate frames allow an even weight distribution across the nose. Modified-wrap 8-base lenses provide some eye protection from the sides. Rubber nose pads and temple tips become tackier with moisture, keeping your shades securely on your face. Spy McCoy Polarized Sunglasses feature a unique tapered shape to provide optically correct, distortion-free viewing at all angles.
short_description: Fast cars and long nights fueled the birth of NASCAR racing and Dale Earnhardt, Jr.'s McCoy Polarized Sunglasses from Spy. They have Dale Jr.'s signature imprinted inside.
